Description.Name: TaintedLoki
Description.Details: Artemus left his birthplace as a young man to pursue life a mercenary. He spent years going traveling around the Inner Sphere seeing combat against various engagements facing mostly pirates with a few against the Clans. When the hostilities cooled, Artemus took the opportunity to travel to Canopian space to relax for a few years. It didn't take long, for things to heat backup during a pirate raid, he fired up a nearby battlemech to take the fight back against the local pirates. Now traveling the stars once again as a merc, occasionally designing new mech variants for clients and looking for interesting times. SPECIAL AFFINITY WITH HATCHETMEN CHECK PASSIVE ABILITIES IN COMBAT FOR A UNIQUE SURPRISE
